attributes.title: This app killed me and I am a ghost now
attributes.review: I was just having a wonderful day, so I though that I should make my day even better by downloading this app. 🤖🦷💃🏾I did this to support my beloved president, trumpster dumpster. 🥐 Boy was that a mistake.  The second I downloaded this app, and I mean the second I downloaded it, scorpions attacked me from the screen and started calling me racial slurs 😯🌪💫 I was poisoned from the scorpions and was in a state of shock. 🌚😱👹 I eventually passed out, when I woke up, I saw trumpster dumpster putting my family of 50 children into a burlap sack. 🐛🌿🌽🍿Before he left my house with my family, he snapped my neck and I became a ghost. 👻🤪🤯 I am currently typing this from my ghost phone, but the only ghost phone I could get on such short notice was an Android. 😭🎃💅🏾 The camera quality is sooo bad. 📷 🧶🦋 I would not recommend downloading this app!! 😡🙅🏾‍♀️🦁😝

attributes.title: bunker boy will track your ip address 😡
attributes.review: i was very skeptical going into this but i decided to go through with it. as soon as i opened the app my phone started glitching and that’s where this nightmare began. a notification popped up on my phone asking me if the app could see my location. i pressed allow not thinking much of it. it was around 3 am in the morning when i started hearing my door knob rattle. i finally heard a giant bang and footsteps walking toward my room and there they were. bunker boy and shane dawson. they proceeded to rip my blanket off and start performing for me. they started to sing “ r-r-r-roll💿up⬆️to2️⃣the🤩party🥳with🧶my🧚crazy🤪pink💝wig💇🏼‍♀️ but I☺️cant🙄get through😍the door✨because my🏡booties🎂too😚big” and then proceeded to start punching me while i tried to run away. the stench they both radiated made me pass out and when i woke up they were both gone. i now have paranoia every time i go to sleep and permanently smell like shane’s piss and grease. i am also covered in orange spray tan that will never come off. i definitely do not recommend downloading this app.

attributes.title: promoting rape
attributes.review: when i opened the app, it showed a picture of a child predator. i am angered that this is the kind of app that you guys allow on here. this was supposed to be a safe environment and this app is not any of that sort. i tried signing in and it called me a “dumb rat” and said my name was stupid. i felt very offended and will not be downloading this again. i wish i could give it 0 stars.
